H0.text: Who led the quest for the golden fleece. Perseus

H1.text: Who led the quest for the golden fleece. Theseus

H2.text: Who led the quest for the golden fleece. Hercules

H3.text: Who led the quest for the golden fleece. Iason

A4.text: Jason assembled for his crew, a number of heroes, known as the Argonauts after their ship, the Argo.

A5.text: Jason ( JAY-sən; Ancient Greek: Ἰάσων, romanized: Iásōn [i.ǎːsɔːn]) was an ancient Greek mythological hero and leader of the Argonauts, whose quest for the Golden Fleece is featured in Greek literature.
